title: 2 arrested in Pine bluff drug operation
title_page: 2 arrested in Pine bluff drug operation
text:
Narcotics officers seized 183.9 grams of methamphetamine from a Pine Bluff home Friday afternoon in an undercover operation, police say.
Assisted by Little Rock police officers, the Pine Bluff vice and narcotics unit conducted the operation at a home in the 3600 block of West Hepburn Street about noon, Pine Bluff Police Department spokesman Officer Richard Wegner said in a news release.
The officers took the methamphetamine and arrested Averick Norman, 41, and Marvin Ford, 33, Wegner said.
Both men were charged with possession of a controlled substance with the purpose to distribute and are being held at the Jefferson County jail with bail not yet set.
